text: allah kerehi manakkalpitava boru gotannan viniscaya dinaya gæna kumak nam sitannehuda? (eya boruvak yayi sitannehuda?) niyata vasayenma allah minisun kerehi imahat dayabaravantayeku vasayen sitinneya. (nætahot ovunva evele evelema danduvam kara ætteya). mese tibiyadi ovungen bohomayak (ohuta) krtagna vanne næta
